publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter: and are to be sold [by W. Barley] in Gratious street nere Leaden Hall Gate,

notesStmt.note: Bookseller's name and publication date from colophon.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
"A solemne passion of the soules loue", in verse, has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Gratious street nere Leaden Hall Gate
